content.raw:
Nice! All the params are spot-on:

![tricyclevisuals.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/EgGzpd/images/90462838-tricyclevisuals.png)

And it's fun to drive too :smile: 

![tricycle2.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/EgGzpd/images/3203804191-tricycle2.gif)


~~~
<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<sdf version="1.6">
  <world name="default">

    <gui fullscreen='0'>
      <plugin name='keyboard' filename='libKeyboardGUIPlugin.so'/>
    </gui>

    <!-- A global light source -->
    <include>
      <uri>model://sun</uri>
    </include>
    <!-- A ground plane -->
    <include>
      <uri>model://ground_plane</uri>
    </include>

    <model name="cycle">
      <include>
        <uri>model://trisphere_cycle</uri>
      </include>

      <plugin name='keystojoints' filename='libKeysToJointsPlugin.so'>

        <!-- up-arrow -->
        <map key='16777235' joint='trisphere_cycle::wheel_rear_left_spin' scale='500' type='force'/>
        <map key='16777235' joint='trisphere_cycle::wheel_rear_right_spin' scale='500' type='force'/>
        <!-- down-arrow -->
        <map key='16777237' joint='trisphere_cycle::wheel_rear_left_spin' scale='-500' type='force'/>
        <map key='16777237' joint='trisphere_cycle::wheel_rear_right_spin' scale='-500' type='force'/>

        <!-- left-arrow -->
        <map key='16777234' joint='trisphere_cycle::wheel_front_steer' scale='0.1' type='position' kp='1000' ki='0' kd='10'/>
        <!-- right-arrow -->
        <map key='16777236' joint='trisphere_cycle::wheel_front_steer' scale='-0.1' type='position' kp='1000' ki='0' kd='10'/>

      </plugin>
    </model>
  </world>
</sdf>

~~~
content.html:
Nice! All the params are spot-on:

And it's fun to drive too 

<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<sdf version="1.6">
  <world name="default">

    <gui fullscreen='0'>
      <plugin name='keyboard' filename='libKeyboardGUIPlugin.so'/>
    </gui>

    <!-- A global light source -->
    <include>
      <uri>model://sun</uri>
    </include>
    <!-- A ground plane -->
    <include>
      <uri>model://ground_plane</uri>
    </include>

    <model name="cycle">
      <include>
        <uri>model://trisphere_cycle</uri>
      </include>

      <plugin name='keystojoints' filename='libKeysToJointsPlugin.so'>

        <!-- up-arrow -->
        <map key='16777235' joint='trisphere_cycle::wheel_rear_left_spin' scale='500' type='force'/>
        <map key='16777235' joint='trisphere_cycle::wheel_rear_right_spin' scale='500' type='force'/>
        <!-- down-arrow -->
        <map key='16777237' joint='trisphere_cycle::wheel_rear_left_spin' scale='-500' type='force'/>
        <map key='16777237' joint='trisphere_cycle::wheel_rear_right_spin' scale='-500' type='force'/>

        <!-- left-arrow -->
        <map key='16777234' joint='trisphere_cycle::wheel_front_steer' scale='0.1' type='position' kp='1000' ki='0' kd='10'/>
        <!-- right-arrow -->
        <map key='16777236' joint='trisphere_cycle::wheel_front_steer' scale='-0.1' type='position' kp='1000' ki='0' kd='10'/>

      </plugin>
    </model>
  </world>
</sdf>
